title: Shino-chan wa Jibun no Namae ga Ienai
original_name: 志乃ちゃんは自分の名前が言えない
sinopse: Oshima Shino can't say her own name. Life at school was lonely until she made her first friend, a classmate/rock-chick named Kayo. Communication between them is never easy, but they they make do with a notepad and a pen. But can youth really turn a klutz into a star?
